text: usane kaha, "tumane maan liya usako, isase pahale ki main tumhen isakee anugya deta? nishchay hee yah tum sabaka pramukh hai, jisane jaadoo sikhaaya hai. achchha, ab main tumhaara haath aur paanv vipareet dishaon se katava doonga aur khanjoor ke tanon par tumhen soolee de doonga. tab tumhen avashy hee maaloom ho jaega ki hamamen se kisakee yaatana adhik kathor aur sthaayee hai
